name: Comedy Master 3D
description:
Become the ultimate Stand-up Comedian. in Comedy Master!

Test out your jokes on the unsuspecting audience in front of you. Set them up with the first line, before its choice time. Which punch line will you choose? Will you have them rolling off their seats laughing? Or will you flounder and fail?

No time to lose! Get your joke book ready!

Comedy Master features:
-Make jokes
-Be a stand-up comedian
-Crazy new simulator!
publishers: Clap Clap Desenvolvimento de Jogos Ltda ME
